title: Manufacturing, Nondurable Goods Sector: Current Dollar Output for All Employed Persons
notes:
Annual indexes for manufacturing and its durable and nondurable goods components are constructed by deflating current-dollar industry value of production data from the U.S. Bureau of the Census with deflators from the BLS. These deflators are based on data from the BLS producer price program and other sources.

 For more information, please go to https://www.bls.gov/news.release/pdf/prod2.pdf PRS32006053
